title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, August 21, 2021
description: “Poetry…answers to no one, it crosses borders without a passport, and it speaks the truth... it is one of the most powerful of the arts."-- Ellen Hinsey, born in 1960.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: “Poetry…answers to no one, it crosses borders without a passport, and it speaks the truth... it is one of the most powerful of the arts."-- Ellen Hinsey, born in 1960.
